summary: Still Super: ‘Avengers’ Is Forecast to Set Box-Office Record
title: Still Super: ‘Avengers’ Is Forecast to Set Box-Office Record
excerpt: One expert predicts $282 million in North American ticket sales, topping the $258 million mark set last year by “Avengers: Infinity War.”
description: It’s really going to come down to word-of-mouth. Infinity War became a ‘must-see’ movie because of the ending, and a lot of people that wouldn’t normally have gone to see it (or see it opening weekend) went to see it simply because everyone kept saying you had to see that ending. If Endgame is able to generate the same you have to see this fervor that IW did, then it might be possible, although I think $282 mil is a little generous.

reblog.comment: It’s really going to come down to word-of-mouth. If Endgame is able to generate the same you have to see this fervor that IW did, then it might be possible, although I think $282 mil is a little generous.

If Endgame is able to generate the same you have to see this fervor that IW did, then it might be possible, although I think $282 mil is a little generous.

summary: Avengers: Endgame is Predicted to Decimate Box Office Records With a $282 Million Opening
title: Avengers: Endgame is Predicted to Decimate Box Office Records With a $282 Million Opening
body:
#AvengersEndgame is Predicted to Decimate Box Office Records With a $282 Million Opening

Last summer, Avengers: Infinity War broke all box office records by delivering the biggest opening weekend of all time. Now that Thanos has wiped out half of the universe and left people wanting to know how the Avengers reverse the decimation, the sequel is predicted to be even bigger.

According to a new article from Bloomberg, a box office researcher predicts that Avengers: Endgame is going to…

blog.name: fandomeats
blog.title: Fandom Eats
blog.description: Making Fandom Themed foods, baked goods, and drinks! Recipes and Pictures!

summary: We bought the Captain America shield cake pan set from Disney Eats and wanted to give it a shot for our viewers. There were no...
caption:
We bought the Captain America shield cake pan set from Disney Eats and wanted to give it a shot for our viewers. There were no real instructions given on how to assemble this cake or how much batter to use, and there were definitely no reviews (at the time we filmed this) to help us out! 

So here we are! This is part three of three: Final product! 

 Recipe for Red dough brought to you buy Sally’s Baking Addiciton: https://sallysbakingaddiction.com/fun… (doubt it, minus the sprinkles, add in as much red food dye as you need to get your dough as red as you want) 

 Recipe for Blue and White: https://iambaker.net/white-cake-cookies/ (add as much blue to the second batch as you need to get it as blue as you want!) 

 You will also need:  three jars of frosting, or two jars split up,  red and blue dye, and white fondant for your Star (or just trace more white frosting into the star cutter).

summary: Avengers: Endgame, Alan Silvestri ha condiviso una foto dietro le quinte
title: Avengers: Endgame, Alan Silvestri ha condiviso una foto dietro le quinte
body:
Avengers: Endgame, Alan Silvestri ha condiviso una foto dietro le quinte

Il compositore di Avengers: Endgame, il grandissimo Alan Silvestri, ha condiviso una foto dietro le quinte del lavoro svolto per l’opera corale firmata Marvel Studios.

Il celebre compositore Alan Silvestri tornerà come creativo dietro lo spartito per Avengers: Endgame, dopo il magistrale lavoro fatto in Avengers: Infinity War, e come prova di ciò il maestro ha recentemente condiviso un’immagine…

summary: People Are Worried That Serena Williams Spoiled Avengers: Endgame
title: People Are Worried That Serena Williams Spoiled Avengers: Endgame
body:
People Are Worried That Serena Williams Spoiled #AvengersEndgame

A video going around makes it sound like Serena Williams may have spoiled a huge death in Avengers: Endgame, and as expected fans on the internet are already wondering what it could mean.

In a Instagram story she posted the other night, that people have since archived and shared, Serena Williams is at the Oscars and filming Chris Evans doing an interview. She’s heard saying that she’s “devastated…

summary: The Deucecast Movie Show #367: And the Oscar Goes to Spring Movies
title: The Deucecast Movie Show #367: And the Oscar Goes to Spring Movies
body:
The Deucecast Movie Show #367: And the Oscar Goes to Spring Movies

Comic Book Movies ruled the Academy Awards winning multiple Oscars and will most definitely dominate the Spring Movie Season.

The Academy Awards just happened… but the recording of this episode was before the Oscars were given out… so what do Mikey, Dave, and #TwitterlessDr Earl do?  Go ahead and record predictions for an episode that will air AFTER the actual results.

blog.name: xarles56
blog.title: Fan of Fury's super-secret boy band
blog.description: Tina | She/her | We stan Tony Stark in this house | Multishipping hoe | AO3:  tina_v

tags: this is less ridiculous than some of the ‘leaks’ out there
im so done with it all
summary:
ENDGAME PLOT LEAK:
Thanos comes to his senses and realizes that his whole plan was utterly stupid and he can just double the...
body:
I’m seeing all this fake plot leaks for Endgame lately and they’re all depressing and horrible so I’m like if you’re gonna make something up how about

ENDGAME PLOT LEAK:

Thanos comes to his senses and realizes that his whole plan was utterly stupid and he can just double the resources and decides to bring everybody back because Myyyyy Gamooooorrraaaaaaa.

Thanos also brings back Loki because he knows fans love the shit out of that little asshole but Loki turns into a snake and follows Thor around silently, then waits until the sun rises to transform and yells at Thor “Told you the sun would shine on us again, brother! YEET!” (He doesn’t know what it means but he finds the word funny. Humans are so dumb)

Everybody is alive and well and T’Challa, Peter and Stephen have some shawarma while they talk about their upcoming sequels. They’re all very excited. Except Wong, he’s been waiting an entire movie for a motherfucking tuna sandwich and he’s pissed.

Pepper gets fed up and she’s like ‘you know what? fuck it I’m putting on my suit which Tony obviously made for me a long time ago (he likes to protect people he loves with tech suits, ie Peter) and I’m using the StarkFindingFriends to locate my hubby’.

She does and she gets Tony and Nebula safely to Earth because Pepper is a fucking badass.

The Guardians fly off to bring back James Gunn because he’s been snapped by Disney and they’re even more powerful than all the six fucking infinity stones put together so God knows where the fuck they’ve sent him.

All the original Avengers meet up and there’s a unicorn and a rainbow in the sky behind them and ALL IS HAPPY AND WELL FOR ONCE IN THIS MOTHERFUCKING CINEMATIC UNIVERSE RUN BY PSYCOPATHS.

When Tony sees Bucky he asks what kind of conditioner he’s been using back in Wakanda because his hair doesn’t look as dirty and he has no more split ends. They both have a laugh about that crazy shit that went down in Siberia and hug because all it’s forgiven.

Bruce finally realizes he’s never ever ever EEEEEVER gonna get a smarter, hotter chick than Nat and decides to cut the ‘we can’t be together’ bullshit. Everybody in the wedding is dressed in green and drunk off their asses so it’s kind of like Saint Patrick’s day and it’s AWESOME.

Then Tony meets with Steve, who offers his arm to Tony when he has to go up the compound’s slippery stairs because he’s such a sweetheart, really, and makes him pot of coffee. They sit down and make amends. They team up to lock up the Russo bothers in the floating prison facility from Civil War so they can never fuck things up again.

Peter finally gets to hug Tony properly and Tony promises they can go as Marty McFly and Doc for Halloween next year. Peter then follows Tony around saying ‘Doooc! you don’t just walk into a store and buy plutonium, Dooooc!’. Tony instantly regrets it. Pepper is laughing her ass off, totally thrilled.

Captain Marvel then is like you guys have done enough, 10 fucking years doing this shit sounds exhausting so I’ll take it from here. Tony please look after my cute cat I hear you like cats and she flies away with her super awesome flying flames and shit.

Clint gets his family back and Laura decides to adopt the OG Avengers because they’re cute so they all go to live at Clint’s farm. Steve rips logs in half with his bare hands while Tony fixes the tractor and plays with his son Morgan.

THE END.

You’re welcome.

summary: Kevin Feige Says Disney+ Series Will Be Intertwined With Marvel Studios Features
title: Kevin Feige Says Disney+ Series Will Be Intertwined With Marvel Studios Features
body:
Kevin Feige Says Disney+ Series Will Be Intertwined With Marvel Studios Features

As the plans for Disney+ continue to solidify, one exciting aspect of the upcoming streaming service for Marvel Studios fans is a series of limited-run programs based on their feature films produced directly by the studio. And as Marvel Studios president Kevin Feige told CinemaBlend, it will allow the productions to “go much, much deeper into a number of our characters and to fully intertwine…

View On WordPress

reblog.comment:
Kevin Feige Says Disney+ Series Will Be Intertwined With Marvel Studios Features

summary: Brilliant ‘Avengers: Endgame’ theory says Iron Man had to die 14 million times to beat Thanos
title: Brilliant ‘Avengers: Endgame’ theory says Iron Man had to die 14 million times to beat Thanos
body:
WOW… Incredible! This is AWESOME!!

The minds behind Avengers: Infinity War had Doctor Strange tell us exactly how many versions of the future he saw until he found the one where the Avengers emerge victorious. We still have no idea why Strange counted them all, or whether he stopped when he found the first path to victory. Strange is a geek of sorts, so of course he would count. He’s also pretty pragmatic, so he knows the odds are…

summary: Quali saranno gli ulteriori film del Marvel Cinematic Universe?
title: Quali saranno gli ulteriori film del Marvel Cinematic Universe?
body:
Going News | 26 febbraio 2019 | cinema | di JCR | Riproduzione riservata

Il boss di Marvel Studios si pronuncerà solo dopo le uscite delle nuove avventure di Spider-Man e Avengers

[Marvel]


Kevin Feige, il boss di Marvel Studios, ha rivelato che non saranno annunciate novità sul Marvel Cinematic Universe fino all'uscita di Avengers: Endgame e Spider-Man: Far From Home, che in Italia verranno rispettivamente distribuiti i prossimi 24 aprile e 4 luglio.


Confidandosi con il sito web ComicBook, Feige ha detto che esiste un “enorme potenziale”, ma i fan avranno dettagli solo dopo aver assistito alle nuove avventure collegate a Thanos e l'Uomo Ragno. “Come fatto per anni, non abbiamo intenzione di annunciare nulla [prima, ndr], ha spiegato il produttore cinematografico statunitense.


Ma, almeno in parte, sappiamo già cosa aspettarci dopo. Oltre al terzo capitolo della saga Guardiani della Galassia, ci saranno i ritorni di Doctor Strange e Black Panther, ma è previsto anche un film tutto dedicato a Natasha Romanoff / Vedova Nera, personaggio altrimenti noto come Black Widow che nel MCU è interpretato da Scarlett Johansson.

blog.name: thelightofthingshopedfor
blog.title: I’m a defeatist but I don’t have to be
blog.description: Kyra, she/her, aro/ace, queer in general. I have a lot of Loki feelings. I write fanfic sometimes, mostly about Loki. I like stupid jokes and I play games on easy because I'm an adult and I can do that if I want to. I also dabble in customizing action figures, and I have an Etsy shop for simple Funko Pop! customs. Additional links and way too many other details here. Formerly visions-and-revisions. I also run the Hope Jar and Alaska Gothic. Ace Inquisitor icon by lukeskywalkersbutt--go commission them!

tags: the adventures of tiny Loki and thor
summary:
“I hate to say I told you so—”

 “No you don’t.”

 “Yeah, okay, I don’t especially hate to say it this time, because—I mean,...
caption:
“I hate to say I told you so—”

“No you don’t.”

“Yeah, okay, I don’t especially hate to say it this time, because—I mean, it’s Thanos. I kicked his butt before. Somebody should’ve called me. We could’ve just prevented aaaaaaallll this gritty grimdark sadness stuff.”

(See the whole series at http://archiveofourown.org/works/3204995)

title: Upcoming Hollywood Movies 2019
body:
New Post has been published on http://muktoprithibi.net/en/upcoming-hollywood-movies-2019/

Upcoming Hollywood Movies 2019

Every single month release new Hollywood Movies. In the bellow list of Upcoming Hollywood Movies in 2019.

Captain Marvel (2019)

Type: Fantasy/Science Fiction
Release date: March 15, 2019 (Japan) Trending
Duration: 2h 12m
Directors: Anna Boden, Ryan Fleck
Based on: Carol Danvers; by: Roy Thomas; Gene Colan
Budget: 152 million USD
Screenplay: Anna Boden, Nicole Perlman, Ryan Fleck, MORE

Captive State (2019)

Type: Thriller/Fantasy
Duration: 1h 49m
Initial release: March 15, 2019 (USA)
Director: Rupert Wyatt
Budget: 25 million USD
Music composed by: Rob Simonsen
Screenplay: Rupert Wyatt

The Curse of La Llorona (2019)

Type: Thriller/Horror
Duration: 1h 33m
Initial release: April 19, 2019 (USA)
Director: Michael Chaves
Producers: James Wan, Gary Dauberman, Emile Gladstone
Production companies: New Line Cinema, Atomic Monster Productions
Screenplay: Tobias Iaconis, Mikki Daughtry

Pet Sematary (2019)

Type: Thriller/Horror
Initial release: April 4, 2019 (Australia)
Directors: Kevin Kolsch, Dennis Widmyer
Production company: Di Bonaventura Pictures
Producers: Lorenzo di Bonaventura, Steven Schneider, Mark Vahradian
Screenplay: Stephen King, Jeff Buhler, David Kajganich

Shazam (2019)

Type: Fantasy/Science Fiction
Initial release: April 5, 2019 (USA)
Director: David Sandberg
Based on: Shazam!; by: Bill Parker; C. C. Beck
Budget: $80–90 million USD
Production companies: Warner Bros., New Line Cinema, Seven Bucks Productions, The Safran Company, DC Films

Hellboy (2019)

Type: Fantasy/Action
Duration: 2h 28m
Initial release: April 12, 2019 (USA)
Director: Neil Marshall
Film series: Hellboy
Production companies: Lionsgate, Dark Horse Entertainment, Campbell Grobman Films, Alchemy
Producers: Lloyd Levin, Lawrence Gordon, Mike Richardson

Avengers: Endgame (2019)

Type: Fantasy/Science Fiction
Initial release: April 26, 2019 (USA) Trending
Directors: Anthony Russo, Joe Russo
Based on: The Avengers; by: Stan Lee; Jack Kirby
Screenplay: Stephen McFeely, Christopher Markus
Story by: Stan Lee, Jack Kirby

John Wick: Chapter 3 – Parabellum (2019)

Type: Thriller/Mystery
Initial release: May 16, 2019
Director: Chad Stahelski
Based on: Characters; by Derek Kolstad
Production company: Summit Entertainment
Producers: Keanu Reeves, Basil Iwanyk, Erica Lee

Aladdin (2019)

Type: Fantasy/Romance
Initial release: May 24, 2019 (USA)
Director: Guy Ritchie
Story by: One Thousand and One Nights
Music composed by: Alan Menken
Producers: Dan Lin, Jonathan Eirich

Dark Phoenix (2019)

Type: Science Fiction/Action
Initial release: June 7, 2019 (USA)
Director: Simon Kinberg
Music composed by: Hans Zimmer
Production companies: Marvel Entertainment, TSG Entertainment, Genre Films
Producers: Simon Kinberg, Bryan Singer, Lauren Shuler Donner, Hutch Parker, Todd Hallowell

Men in Black: International (2019)

Type: Fantasy/Science Fiction
Initial release: June 14, 2019 (USA)
Director: F. Gary Gray
Production companies: Sony Pictures, Columbia Pictures, Amblin Entertainment, Image Nation
Producers: Walter Parkes, Laurie MacDonald
Screenplay: Matthew Hollaway, Art Marcum
